member.name: D2D1_PRINT_FONT_SUBSET_MODE
member.summary: Defines when font resources should be subset during printing.

summary.para: Uses a heuristic strategy to decide when to subset fonts.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] If the print driver has requested archive-optimized content, then Direct2D will subset fonts once, for the entire document.

member.name: D2D1_PRINT_FONT_SUBSET_MODE.D2D1_PRINT_FONT_SUBSET_MODE_EACHPAGE
member.summary: Subsets and embeds font resources in each page, then discards that font subset after the page is printed out.

member.name: D2D1_PRINT_FONT_SUBSET_MODE.D2D1_PRINT_FONT_SUBSET_MODE_NONE
member.summary: Sends out the original font resources without subsetting along with the page that first uses the font, and re-uses the font resources for later pages without resending them.

member.name: D2D1_PRINT_FONT_SUBSET_MODE.D2D1_PRINT_FONT_SUBSET_MODE_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: A value that's guaranteed to be a DWORD.
